description.long: Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%, Enhances the healing potential and damage absorption of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Heal.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.

Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.   NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.

Gives a chance of granting the powers target a small infusion of endurance.  This effect will trigger roughly 3.5 times per minute.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into healing powers that require a To Hit check.
